recipesJson.name: Nick’s Ice-Cream Trinity
recipesJson.author: Nickevz
recipesJson.description:
Here’s my take on an ice-cream trinity, Liquid barn VIC is the base as it’s just the best solo ice-cream flavour in my opinion, FA milk gives it the slightly melt in your mouth feeling and then its all ironed out with a touch of FA premium custard. A bunch of naughty DAAP filled concentrates that work a dream together to create an amazing Vanilla ice-cream.

Make a one-shot concentrate and use between 4-6% with other fruits/desserts for best results.

reviews.text: Great Ice-Cream base! Creamy vanilla yum! Thanks for sharing!
Thought I give it a go and whip it with some blueberries... and there you go - a new ADV. Thanks Nick, keep on with the sorcery you do!
Very solid Ice Cream Base which can be easily manipulated into any type of ice cream! It's even good off the shake, Good Job again Nick!

Only just realised this hasnt got any reviews which i find odd.
A great Ice Cream flavour on its own but i find it works best as a base for other flavours and fruits when looking to mix a nice ice cream vape. Used this quite a few times now as its becoming abit of a default ice cream for me now
